item.name: Home
item.description: Fifteen years ago, I brought home my Daisy girl. She, a 6-month old bichon poodle, stole my heart the moment she waddled over to me and greeted me by lifting her tush into the air for a salutary scratch. That second, Daisy ceased to be “just a cute dog,” and became my best friend, soul […]
